title: Of mariage and vviuing An excellent, pleasant, and philosophicall controuersie, betweene the two famous Tassi now liuing, the one Hercules the philosopher, the other, Torquato the poet. Done into English, by R.T. Gentleman.
author: Tasso, Ercole.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by Thomas Creede, and are to be sold by Iohn Smythicke, at his shop in Fleetstreete, neare the Temple Gate,
